data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Avila, Luciano Javier, Perez, Cristian Hernan Fulvio, Perez, Daniel Roberto, Morando, Mariana (2011): Two new mountain lizard species of the Phymaturus genus (Squamata: Iguania) from northwestern Patagonia, Argentina. Zootaxa 2924: 1-21, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277941
